languages.text: {n}Несколько рабочих выворачивают карманы, и в сундучок рядом с полем летят пайковые талоны, гайки и несколько портативных энергопластин. Флейтист подмигивает толпе, и новая мелодия вырывается из его инструмента.{/n}

{n}Several workers empty their pockets and start throwing ration cards, bolt nuts, and even a few power panels into the small chest next to the board. The flute player winks at the crowd and switches to a different tune.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько рабочих выворачивают карманы, и в сундучок рядом с полем летят пайковые талоны, гайки и несколько портативных энергопластин. Флейтист подмигивает толпе, и новая мелодия вырывается из его инструмента.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plusieurs ouvriers vident leurs poches et jettent des tickets de rationnement, des boulons et même quelques panneaux d'alimentation dans le petit coffret près du plateau. Le joueur de flûte fait un clin d'œil à la foule avant de changer de mélodie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several workers empty their pockets and start throwing ration cards, bolt nuts, and even a few power panels into the small chest next to the board. The flute player winks at the crowd and switches to a different tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plusieurs ouvriers vident leurs poches et jettent des tickets de rationnement, des boulons et même quelques panneaux d'alimentation dans le petit coffret près du plateau. Le joueur de flûte fait un clin d'œil à la foule avant de changer de mélodie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Varios trabajadores se vacían los bolsillos y arrojan tarjetas de racionamiento, tuercas y hasta algún que otro panel eléctrico al interior de un cofre pequeño situado junto al tablero. El flautista hace un guiño a la multitud y empieza a tocar una melodía distinta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several workers empty their pockets and start throwing ration cards, bolt nuts, and even a few power panels into the small chest next to the board. The flute player winks at the crowd and switches to a different tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Varios trabajadores se vacían los bolsillos y arrojan tarjetas de racionamiento, tuercas y hasta algún que otro panel eléctrico al interior de un cofre pequeño situado junto al tablero. El flautista hace un guiño a la multitud y empieza a tocar una melodía distinta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数名の労働者がポケットの中身を空にして、配給カードやボルトナット、さらにはパワーパネル数枚を遊戯盤の横にある小さな箱に放り込み始める。フルート吹きが見物客に向かってウィンクして、別の曲を演奏し始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several workers empty their pockets and start throwing ration cards, bolt nuts, and even a few power panels into the small chest next to the board. The flute player winks at the crowd and switches to a different tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数名の労働者がポケットの中身を空にして、配給カードやボルトナット、さらにはパワーパネル数枚を遊戯盤の横にある小さな箱に放り込み始める。フルート吹きが見物客に向かってウィンクして、別の曲を演奏し始めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}几个工人掏空了口袋，把兜里的配给卡、螺栓、螺母，甚至几块电源板丢进了游戏板旁边的小箱子里。吹笛人朝人群眨了眨眼，之后吹起了另一支曲子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several workers empty their pockets and start throwing ration cards, bolt nuts, and even a few power panels into the small chest next to the board. The flute player winks at the crowd and switches to a different tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几个工人掏空了口袋，把兜里的配给卡、螺栓、螺母，甚至几块电源板丢进了游戏板旁边的小箱子里。吹笛人朝人群眨了眨眼，之后吹起了另一支曲子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mehrere Arbeiter leeren ihre Taschen und werfen Essensmarken, Schraubenmuttern und sogar einige Netzschaltfelder in die kleine Kiste neben dem Brett. Der Flötenspieler winkt den Leuten zu und wechselt zu einer anderen Melodie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several workers empty their pockets and start throwing ration cards, bolt nuts, and even a few power panels into the small chest next to the board. The flute player winks at the crowd and switches to a different tune.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mehrere Arbeiter leeren ihre Taschen und werfen Essensmarken, Schraubenmuttern und sogar einige Netzschaltfelder in die kleine Kiste neben dem Brett. Der Flötenspieler winkt den Leuten zu und wechselt zu einer anderen Melodie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birçok işçi, ceplerini boşaltarak tahtanın yanındaki küçük sandığa kumanya kartları, vidalar ve hatta birkaç güç paneli atıyor. Flütçü, kalabalığa göz kırparak farklı bir melodiye geçiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several workers empty their pockets and start throwing ration cards, bolt nuts, and even a few power panels into the small chest next to the board. The flute player winks at the crowd and switches to a different tune.{/n}
